simplified: Your dreams can show you new ideas about things. You did not know you were thinking about these things before. Many people have the same dreams. Some people dream they can fly. Some people dream they are falling. Some people dream their teeth fall out. Some people dream they have no clothes on when other people can see them. These dreams probably mean similar things for most people. But you must think about your own life to understand your dreams. You must think about what happens in your day. You must think about how you feel every day. Then you can understand what your dreams mean for you.

Wild dogs live in Moscow city. This is very interesting. About 35,000 wild dogs live on the streets in Moscow. Some dogs were born on the streets. Other dogs were pets before. Their owners left them and they became street dogs. Some dogs live alone. Other dogs live in groups with other dogs. In 2010, scientists watched these dogs. They wanted to learn about them. The scientists found something amazing. The dogs learned to live in the city very well. The dogs know it is safer to cross streets with people. Some dogs can understand traffic lights. They wait when the light is red. They cross when the light is green.

Wonder is a book by RJ Palacio. She is from New York. This is her first book. On her website, she tells us about the idea for the book. One day she saw a girl on the street. The girl had problems with her face. This gave RJ Palacio the idea for Wonder. The book is very popular in the United States. Many people buy it. It won several awards too. Many schools use this book now. Teachers and students talk about bullying because of this book. They also talk about friendship. They talk about what it feels like to be different from other people. People are making a film of this book now. Many people want to see it. I want to see it too. We all want to know what RJ Palacio will write next.

Chloe has two pet rats. Their names are Zena and Roxy. Chloe knows that rats are not normal pets. Many people do not like rats. Chloe talks to these people many times. She tells them that rats are not dirty. She says rats are very good pets. But people must take care of them well. Chloe understands why people do not like rats. She did not like rats before too. Then her friend Martin showed her his pet rats. Chloe saw that the rats were very loving. She saw that they were very smart. Last year, one of Martin's rats had babies. Chloe wanted to have two baby rats. So she took two of them home.

Cape Town is a dangerous place for baboons. Some baboons get hurt or die in car accidents. Other baboons die when they touch electric cables. They play with the cables and get electrocuted.

Baboons are an endangered species. This means there are not many baboons left. The city council wants to save them. They also want to stop problems between humans and baboons. So the city council has a team of Baboon Monitors.

The monitors have an important job. They chase baboons out of the city areas. They also catch baboons and take them to the countryside. Then they let the baboons go free there.

This plan works well sometimes. But there is still a problem. The baboons come back to the city again and again. They think the city has easy food for them. So it is hard to keep them away.

I work for a big computer company around the world. The main office is in America. I do all my work on my computer at home. I don't need to travel to an office every day. I don't need to talk with other workers when I don't want to. I work on different projects. This is very good for me because I can stop work when I want to. When my children have shows at school, I can go and watch them. When I need to go to the dentist, I can make a time and go. But there is one bad thing. I don't have normal office times like 9 to 5. So I often work until very late at night. Sometimes I don't eat dinner because I want to finish my work first.

In the 1990s, graffiti was still popular. Street art also became very popular around the world. Some artists wanted to talk about politics. They made art about war. They made art about bad treatment of people. They wanted people to think about these problems. Other street artists wanted to make beautiful art. They wanted to make nice work. In South America, many street artists worked in poor areas. These areas did not have much money. The city walls were grey and ugly. The artists put colours on the walls. They made the walls look beautiful. They made life better for people there.

Social media, magazines and shop windows show people many things to buy every day. British people are buying more clothes and shoes than before. Online shopping is easy. Customers can buy things quickly without thinking. Big clothing companies sell very cheap clothes. People can wear these clothes two or three times. Then they throw them away like rubbish.

Sam looked at the sun. It was very bright. He could see dust behind a car. The car was going to the Big House. The horses moved their legs and tails. There were flies on them. The horses did not care about their owner. The owner was coming for the first visit in ten months.

Sam waited. Mr Carter did not come here often. He only came when he had to. Sam was happy about this. When Sam stayed away from his boss, he could keep his job longer.

Mr Carter was hot. He cleaned the sweat from his neck. His shirt was wet in many places. The wet parts looked like shapes on a map. His skin was getting red because of the June sun. But his skin was pale like people who stay inside. Mr Carter was a man who made money. Other people did the work for him.

Many people who live in Berlin, Germany said that shooting pigs was too cruel. Hunters and people who love animals had big fights about this. People made protests about shooting the pigs. So the city council decided to do something more peaceful against the pigs. Now they do not shoot the pigs. They put up fences instead. They also made a new law. Now people cannot feed the pigs because it is illegal. We will see if this plan works in the future. But it may be very difficult to win against the pigs. This is because winters are warmer now than before. When winters are warmer, there are more pigs than in the past.

Suzanne Collins wrote the Hunger Games book. She got an important idea from old Greek stories. When Suzanne was a child, she loved one story very much. The story was about Theseus and the Minotaur.

In this old story, Athens was a city. Crete was another place with a king. The king of Crete controlled Athens. But the people from Athens did not want this. They fought against the king.

The king was angry because the people fought him. His name was Minos. He wanted to punish the people of Athens. So King Minos made a new rule. Every year, Athens must send fourteen young people to Crete. Seven of them were boys and seven were girls.

When the young people came to Crete, something terrible happened. There was a big maze there. People called this maze the labyrinth. The king put the young people into the labyrinth. A dangerous monster lived in the labyrinth. The monster was called the Minotaur. The Minotaur ate all the young people.

But one day, a young man called Theseus went into the labyrinth. Theseus was brave and strong. He fought with the Minotaur. Theseus killed the monster.

Suzanne thinks Katniss Everdeen is like Theseus. But Katniss lives in the future.

Zoos bring people and animals together. This can teach people about saving animals. People can learn why animals need help. Then people want to protect animals and their homes.

Some animals had bad lives before zoos. Some animals worked in circuses and people hurt them. Some animals were pets but their owners left them. These animals can live safely in zoos now.

Zoos also do important work to learn new things. Zoo workers study how animals act. They also learn how to help sick animals get better.

A new idea is starting. This idea is different from buying many things. People call it the 'buy nothing' idea. This idea started in Canada in the early 1990s. Then it moved to the US. In the US, people did not like spending too much money. They did not like buying too many things on Black Friday and Cyber Monday. These are shopping days after Thanksgiving weekend. On Buy Nothing Day, people make protests. They cut up their credit cards. All year, Buy Nothing groups meet. They give things to each other. They fix things they already have.

Is graffiti art or is it vandalism? This depends on what you think. In many countries, you cannot write or paint on public buildings. You cannot write or paint on private buildings too. The police think this is vandalism. Many street artists have problems with the police. The police stop them when they paint. Some artists must pay money because they painted on walls. Many city councils are not happy about graffiti. They must clean the graffiti from buildings. They must clean it from buses and trains too. This cleaning costs a lot of money.

What do art people think about graffiti and street art? Now, more people think it is real art. Big art shows happen in Paris, London and Los Angeles. These shows have street art in them. An American artist called Elura Emerald made a street art show in New York in 2008. She said good things about street artists. She said "Artists who paint on the street want to show their feelings. They do not hurt anyone. People should like their art and be happy about it."

Most people have four to six dreams every night when they are ten years old or older. That means they have about 2,000 dreams every year. When a person is 80 years old, they had about 140,000 dreams in their life. We forget most of our dreams. We forget 95 to 99 dreams from every 100 dreams. But we still remember a few thousand dreams in our life. Sometimes we dream about something and then it happens in real life. This can happen because many dreams are about things that happen often in everyday life. So it is not strange when a dream and real life are similar.

The Hunger Games happens in the future. North America was destroyed before this time. Now there is a new country called Panem. Panem has twelve poor districts and one rich place called the Capitol. The Capitol has all the power in the country. The Capitol controls everything in the nation. Each district must make different things for the Capitol. District 12 is where the story starts. District 12 gives all the coal to the country. There was a thirteenth district before. This district fought against the Capitol in the past. The Capitol destroyed the thirteenth district because they fought.

Wild animals often come into cities because they want to find food. In Cape Town, South Africa, baboons now come into the areas where people live. These areas are at the edge of the city. The baboons come there to eat. They open the rubbish bins and look for food inside. They also eat fruit from people's gardens. Some baboons are very brave. They go into people's houses. They take food from the kitchen cupboards and fridges! Baboons can be dangerous and angry. They have attacked many pet animals in the city. So many people who live in the city do not want the baboons there. This is easy to understand.

Many bridge accidents happen when people are building the bridge. These accidents often happen because engineers make mistakes. For example, they do not calculate the weight correctly. Then the bridge falls down because it is too heavy. This is very dangerous for the workers. The workers can die when the bridge falls on them.

George Lucas was a film director. He made his story using 17 steps of the hero's journey. The hero usually starts with a normal life. Then something happens and calls the hero to go on an adventure. This adventure changes everything for the hero. In Star Wars, Luke lives a normal life at the beginning. He lives with his aunt and uncle. He fixes robots every day. One day, he finds a message from Princess Leia inside the robot R2D2. The message is for Obi-Wan Kenobi. This message is 'the call to adventure'. It starts Luke on his hero journey.

Another idea is to protect Earth from a dangerous space rock. We can blow it up with a nuclear bomb. This sounds like a story from a movie. There was a film about this in 1998. The film was called Armageddon. But NASA has a real plan called HAMMER. HAMMER means Hypervelocity Asteroid Mitigation Mission for Emergency Response. They want to send big rockets to space. These rockets weigh eight tons. The rockets will hit the space rock. The space rock is coming to Earth. NASA hopes this will push the rock away from Earth. But sometimes the space rock is too close to Earth. Then this plan will not work. So the rockets will carry nuclear bombs. The bombs will blow up the space rock.

Campbell says the hero first says no to the adventure. But then a teacher comes to help them. The teacher helps the hero decide to go. This means the hero goes into a new world. This is where the adventure happens.

The next part has many tests for the hero. The hero must fight bad people. The hero must meet good friends too. This makes the hero ready for the big fight.

Luke's teacher is Obi-Wan. His friends are Han Solo and two robots. The robots are R2D2 and C3PO. His enemy is Darth Vader. The new world for Luke is inside the Death Star.

Things that people do not use much may look useless to some people. But other people can find these things helpful. The internet changed this situation. Online groups found a way to make money when people share things they do not use often. There are websites and social media groups now. These help people buy and sell old things to each other. It is very easy now for people to share things with other people. We call this the sharing economy.

In the 1700s and 1800s, people had two main ideas about dreams. The first idea was that dreams show us things we do not know about ourselves. A man called Freud said this. He believed that dreams can tell us about our secret feelings. He thought dreams can help us understand our problems too.

But the second idea was very different. This idea said that dreams are not important. It said that dreams happen when our brain works at night. Our brain puts together memories from the day. The brain mixes these memories in a random way. When we wake up, we try to understand these mixed pictures and feelings. We try to make them into a story that makes sense.

I work for myself. I do not have a boss. This is very good because I can choose what I do. I can also choose how I use my time. 

First, I worked at home. But I could not think well there. There were too many things around me. I had to do housework. I wanted to drink tea many times. My family always wanted to talk to me about different things.

So I went to a café near my house to work. But the internet was not very good there. I also drank too much coffee every day.

Then I decided to pay money for a desk in an office. Five other people work there too. They also work for themselves like me. I really liked this. I got dressed in the morning to go to work. I could think much better in the office.

NASA wants to find all the middle-sized NEOs. But they need money to build NEOCam first. NEOCam is a space telescope. It is 0.5 metres big. It uses infrared light to find asteroids. If NASA gets the money, they can finish this work in ten years. When they find all the asteroids, they will make a list. But then the planetary defence team must learn how to protect Earth. They must stop the really dangerous asteroids from hitting our planet. These dangerous asteroids are called PHAs.

The 'buy nothing' idea is now popular with influencers on social media. These people usually show clothes and make-up on their posts. They tell people to buy these things. But now some YouTube stars tell their viewers to stop buying things. They say people should not buy anything for a long time. Some people do this for one year.

Two friends in Canada did not buy things for one year. They only bought food. In the first three months, they learned to live differently. They did not buy electrical things, clothes or things for their house. Then they stopped using services too. They did not go to the hairdresser. They did not eat at restaurants. They did not buy petrol for their cars. After one year, they saved $55,000.

Religion is very important to Pi. His family is Hindu. But Pi wants to learn about other religions too. He becomes friends with a Christian priest. He also becomes friends with a Muslim baker. Then Pi says something that surprises everyone. He says he is Hindu, Muslim and Christian at the same time. His family does not understand this. His teachers do not understand this either. They ask Pi to choose only one religion. But Pi says no. He tells them 'I just want to love God'. After Pi says this, his family stops asking him to choose. His teachers stop asking him too. They decide that Pi can choose his own religion. They will not tell him what to do about religion anymore.

Some people think you should write your dreams down. They say this can help you have lucid dreams. Lucid dreams are special dreams. In these dreams, you know you are dreaming. You can also make choices in your dreams. You can change what happens in your dreams.

For example, you can change a bad dream into a good dream. You can control your dream like a movie director. You can decide what happens next in your dream.

When you do this, you are not just thinking about your dreams. You are making your dreams. But you should also have some normal dreams too. Normal dreams can show you what you are thinking about. Your mind can tell you important things when you sleep.

People do not know they make a clothing problem worse. They give their old clothes to charity shops. They think this helps. But charity shops cannot sell all these clothes. Fast fashion clothes go out of style very quickly. These clothes are also very cheap quality. People do not want to buy them in second-hand shops. So charity shops must throw away many clothes. They also send many clothes to other countries. This makes economic problems in those countries. It also makes environmental problems there.

Some people today want many exciting trips. They go from one challenge to another challenge. Meagan McGrath is from Canada. She climbed the highest mountain on every continent. She rode her bike across all of Canada. She ran a very long race in the Sahara Desert when it was 45°C. But her most amazing trip was skiing to the South Pole. On the first day, she fell into a big ice hole. Other people had to help her get out. Many people would stop trying after this happened. But Meagan decided to continue her trip. She reached the South Pole after forty days. She pulled a heavy sledge behind her. The sledge had her tent and all her food in it. She traveled through very cold weather and ice storms.

Blek le Rat started to paint rats on walls in Paris. Paris is his home city. Now he wants people to think about social problems. He paints pictures of homeless people in big cities. He does this because he wants people to think about homelessness. This is a big problem in cities.

In some places, city councils want to help graffiti artists. They do not want artists to paint on walls everywhere. So they give artists special places to paint. Taiwan has these special places. They call them 'graffiti zones'. Artists can paint and write on walls there. They are free to do this. In São Paulo, Brazil, the city council did something different. They let some graffiti artists paint on subway trains in the city.

Faith47 is from Cape Town in South Africa. She paints big pictures with many colours. She paints people and animals. She likes to go to different places to paint. You can see her work on the street. She paints on empty buildings and old cars too. Most street art does not stay for a long time. The rain and wind can remove it. People from the city can clean it away too. Faith47 likes this because life always changes. Things end and new things begin. This happens again and again.

Before, Gabriela worked in a place where people respected bosses very much. Everyone knew their place at work. In her old job, the boss made all the big decisions. Workers did not ask questions or say no to the boss.

But Gabriela's Swedish team was different. In Sweden, workers and bosses work together. They talk about problems and make decisions together. The Swedish bosses help their workers like teachers or friends. They want workers to think for themselves. They want workers to ask questions and give different ideas. Swedish workers can say when they do not agree with their boss.

When Gabriela learned about the cultural differences between her and her team, she decided to talk openly with them. She wanted to know how they felt about her leadership. Her team was happy because she asked for their thoughts. They told her that they were not used to people telling them what to do. They liked to have more freedom to make their own decisions. They enjoyed being creative in their work. When Gabriela told her team exactly what to do, they felt bad. They thought she did not trust them to do good work. The team understood that Gabriela felt hurt when they tried to change her decisions. They explained to her that this was how they always worked before. They wanted her to know this was normal for them.

Os Gêmeos are two brothers from São Paulo. They are identical twins. They paint many different things. They paint small tags and big pictures. They paint colorful pictures of people on building walls. Their pictures are very big. They need special machines to help them paint high places. In 2007, they painted a whole castle in Scotland. They covered all the castle walls with paint.

People painted and wrote on walls for a very long time. Long ago, people in Africa and Europe painted pictures of animals and people in caves. People also wrote on walls in old places in Greece, Italy, Syria and Iraq. In the old Roman town of Pompeii, scientists found many examples of writing on walls. People wrote these messages in Latin. The messages were about religion, politics and love. Some messages were even magic spells!

Do you want to climb Mount Everest? Do you want to walk to the South Pole? Many people have these dreams. You are not the only person who thinks about this. Every year, thousands of people try to climb the highest mountains in the world. They also try to walk across big countries. In the past, explorers used maps and compasses when they traveled. Today's adventurers are different. They travel with modern technology. They use GPS and satellite phones. Many adventurers love nature. They use their travels to help the environment. They want people to know about environmental problems. Other adventurers want to help people who need help. They raise money for charities when they travel.

The first plan is DART. DART means Double Asteroid Redirection Test. Scientists want to test DART on a small moon. This moon goes around an asteroid called Didymos. People call the small moon 'Didymoon'. Didymoon is 150 metres wide. It goes around its big asteroid mother. The mother asteroid is 800 metres wide. Scientists hope DART will hit Didymoon hard. Then Didymoon will move out of its normal path. When this happens, telescopes on Earth can see the change.

The main character in the story is a girl called Katniss Everdeen. She is sixteen years old. Her father died in a mining accident. Now she must find food for her family. She goes hunting in the woods near District 12. Her friend Gale goes with her. She learns to use a bow and arrow very well. Her younger sister is called Prim. Prim is chosen to be a tribute. Katniss says she will go instead of her sister. The other tribute from District 12 is a boy. His name is Peeta. Katniss starts to have difficult feelings about Peeta.

When you write about your dreams, you will remember more things about them. Think about the people in your dream. Think about the place where your dream happened. These things can help you understand what your dream means. After one week, you will be surprised. You will see that you wrote down many things about your dreams. Now you can connect your dreams to things that happen in your real life every day. You can also connect your dreams to your feelings.

In the past, people made most bridges from wood. Wood bridges could catch fire very easily. This was a big problem for old train bridges. Train wheels are made of steel. Train tracks are also made of steel. When steel wheels move on steel tracks, they make sparks. Sometimes these sparks made the wooden bridges catch fire. Then the whole bridge burned down.

We do not know how street art will change in the future. But we can see some new things happening now. Most street artists are young people. They usually paint in their own city or area near their home. But now more and more street artists travel to different countries. They work in many places around the world. Other artists use the internet to talk to each other. They share photos of their art online. Also, the art world is starting to accept street art more. They think it is real art now. We do not know what will happen to street art in the future. But we are sure that street art will stay with us!

Suzanne Collins always feels sad when she watches news about wars on TV. When she was a little girl, her father was a pilot. He worked for the US Air Force and he went to fight in Vietnam. Her mother wanted to keep her safe. So her mother did not tell her about the war. But Suzanne still saw the war news on TV. She knew that her dad was in that dangerous place. This made her feel very scared.

A big company called PwC did a survey around the world. They asked more than 40,000 people questions. Some people were millennials. Millennials are people who were born between 1983 and 1993. Other people were not millennials. The survey asked about workplace culture and communication. It also asked about working styles and pay structure. People answered questions about career development too. They also talked about work-life balance.

Another big company called Deloitte did a different survey around the world. More than 10,000 millennials answered their questions. This survey was about what millennials think. It asked about threats and opportunities in the work world. The work world is complex and difficult.

Erik Weihenmayer is from the United States. He loves adventure and travels to many places. He rode his bike through the hot deserts of Morocco. He went kayaking through the Grand Canyon. He also climbed Mount Everest, the highest mountain in the world. Erik cannot see because he became blind when he was 13 years old. But he still does amazing things. Erik wants to help other people with disabilities. He tells them they can live active lives too. He takes groups of young blind people on climbing trips. He shows them they can climb mountains and do sports.

Online websites help people make some money quickly. For example, busy parents did not want to sell things at local markets before. They did not have time to set up a table there. But now parents can use online shops to sell things. They can sell baby clothes that their children cannot wear now. They can sell expensive baby chairs and baby things they bought before. When they sell these things, they get money back. This helps parents because baby things cost a lot of money.

Pi and Richard Parker stay in the lifeboat for 227 days. They feel very hungry and sick. They are very tired. Big storms come and the Pacific sun is very hot. But they do not die. Sometimes Pi feels better because he has three religions. But sometimes he feels very sad and alone. Then they see the coast of Mexico far away. Everything changes then. I will not tell you the end of the story. You must read the book. Then you will know what happens to Pi and Richard Parker when they see the land.

Chloe came home from school. She made a cup of coffee for herself. She took the coffee to her bedroom. She had homework to do but she wanted to do it later. She wanted to enjoy the quiet time. Her parents were not home yet. When her parents came home, the house would be noisy. There would be talking and television sounds. Her dad would listen to jazz music when he cooked dinner. He loved jazz music very much. Chloe liked this quiet time of day. She could play with her pet rats then.

In 2010, NASA had a special team. This team looks for dangerous rocks in space. These rocks are called asteroids. The team found 90 percent of the big asteroids near Earth. These asteroids are 1km wide. They are as big as mountains.

NASA calls these rocks "near-Earth objects" or NEOs. These objects are within 50 million kilometres of Earth. The team knows about 887 asteroids now. NASA thinks there are about 50 more asteroids to find.

NASA says these 887 asteroids are not dangerous to Earth. They will not hit our planet.

Auggie decided to go to school. Then he had to face his first day. Every child feels worried when they start at a new school. Auggie felt very worried too. But it was much harder for him because of his face. Other children did not want to sit next to him. He saw them looking at him. He saw them talking about him with their hands over their mouths. But good things happened too. He became friends with Jack, a boy in his class. He also became friends with Summer, a girl he talked with at lunch. The first day was not the only hard day. Auggie learned that his classmates did not want to touch him. They were afraid they would get sick from him. They called it 'the plague'. During the school year, Auggie had many good days and bad days. Then something big and scary happened at a school camp. This event changed everything for Auggie.

The two men looked north. They looked at the land there. The land went very far. They could not see the end of it. They could not see the fences well from where they stood. The fences were too far away. A teenage boy might feel bored and angry. But he could not walk away from this place. It was too big and too far to other places.

Sam looked at the biggest horse. The horse was hitting the ground with its feet. The feet were big and heavy. Sam thought about something. Could the boy ride a horse? There were many bad things a good rider could do here. This place was very far from other people. But maybe there were more bad things for someone different. Someone who did not know about horses. Someone who wanted to go away from his father.

More than 4,000 climbers went to the top of Everest. These climbers were between thirteen and eighty years old. Climbing high mountains is still very dangerous. The weather is very cold and there are bad storms. The best climbers in the world now want new challenges. Gerlinde Kaltenbrunner is from Austria. She started to love mountain climbing when she was a teenager. She finished school and then worked as a nurse. But she climbed mountains in her free time.

Gerlinde climbed Everest. After that, she decided to climb all fourteen mountains in the world. These mountains are 8,000 metres high. Gerlinde wants to make climbing more difficult for herself. So she climbs without oxygen tanks. This is very dangerous. There is not much oxygen at the top of high mountains. When people do not get enough oxygen, their brain and body cannot work well. Gerlinde is a famous climber. She uses her fame to help a charity. This charity helps poor children in Nepal. It also helps children who do not have parents.

If we look at the things we bought in our lives, we can see something. We do not use everything we own well. We have a thick warm coat that we thought looked good. But we live in a hot country so we do not wear it. We have an old smartphone that we do not use now. We put it away when we bought a new phone. We have a car that we only use on Saturday and Sunday. We even have a guest room in our house. But now we use it to keep our old things there.

For many years and in many countries, people thought dreams could tell the future. People believed that gods sent dreams to give them important information. They thought dreams were special messages. Even now, many people remember when they had a dream about something. Later, the same thing happened in real life. The dream came true. This can happen with events, places, or people.

Some of the biggest and most expensive travel projects in the world are bridges. These projects cost a lot of money. Bridges are very important connections. They help cars, trucks and trains go across water. They also go across deep mountain valleys and other roads. Because of this, bridges are one of the most important parts when people build things. Many people watch bridges very carefully. This is especially true when bridges fall down.

Gabriela had problems with her team for many weeks. She felt very frustrated. She decided to send an email to her Swedish manager. She told him about all the problems with her team.

Her manager read the email. He asked her two simple questions. He wanted to know if her team was still doing good work. He also asked what could help her work better with her team members.

Gabriela read his answer. She thought his questions were not clear enough. She wanted more help from him. She did not think he was doing his job well as a manager.

Dogs that live in groups have learned something interesting. They know that humans like to give food to small, cute dogs. So these groups send their smallest and cutest dogs to ask people for food. The small dogs get food for all the dogs in their group.

Some dogs have also learned to use the city trains. They use the trains to go from one place to another in their area. Scientists do not know how the dogs know when to get off the train.

Scientists have two ideas about this. The first idea is that dogs use their nose. Dogs can smell very well. They learn to know the smells of places they want to go to. The second idea is that dogs learn to know the names of train stations. They hear the station names when people make announcements on the train.

People who use the trains see dogs on trains all the time now. Local people do not notice the dogs much anymore because they see them so often.

Ed Stafford is from the UK. He is the first person to walk along the Amazon River from start to end. He started his walk by a small stream in the Andes mountains in Peru. He finished his walk at the river's mouth in Brazil. The walk took two years and four months. He walked 6,000 kilometres. The Amazon rainforest has dangerous animals. There are poisonous snakes, crocodiles and jaguars there. So Ed was always in danger. But he was lucky. He did not get badly hurt. He only got many mosquito bites and ant bites. There were a few thousand bites.

In Britain, people buy new clothes every year. They spend more than £1,000 on clothes. This is four per cent of their money. This sounds okay, but there are two big problems. The first problem is about money. Many people use credit cards to buy clothes. British people must pay £670 to credit card companies. This is 66 per cent of their clothes money. So people spend money they don't have. The second problem is about waste. People buy clothes they don't need. Then they throw away these clothes. Britain throws away 300,000 tons of clothes every year. Most of these clothes go to big holes in the ground. This is bad for our world.

Ed could not walk without technology. He used a radio to talk to people in the rainforest. He asked them for food and permission to walk on their land. Many people came to meet him. They helped him walk through the most difficult places. Ed wrote a blog when he walked. He wrote about his experiences every day. Many people were interested in his trip. Ed used this interest to protest about the destruction of the rainforest. He also wanted to get money for environmental charities and children's charities in Brazil and Peru.

Businesses now understand that the sharing economy can make good money. They want to make money from things that people do not use much. Many companies now use a business plan that is very popular. These companies make websites that help customers find people. These people can give them products or services that they need.

Companies like Airbnb help people make money from empty rooms and houses. People can rent out these rooms to other people and get money for this. This is a good way to make money from rooms that nobody uses.

Uber is another example of this. Uber helps people use their own cars like taxis. People can drive other people in their cars when they have free time. They can make extra money this way.

Today, zoos have a very important job. They help animals from different countries have babies. This is very important for animals that might disappear forever.

In nature, some very rare animals cannot find other animals to have babies with. Bad people also try to kill these animals. The places where animals live are disappearing. Other dangerous animals also try to eat them.

Good zoos give these animals a safe place to live. In zoos, these animals can have babies safely. No one can hurt them there.

When there are not many wild animals left, they become too similar to each other. This is bad for the animals. Zoo animals can help with this problem. People can take animals from zoos and put them back in nature. Then the wild animals will be different from each other again. This helps all the animals stay healthy.

These two kinds of accidents do not happen very often. But boats and trains can make a bridge fall down for different reasons. When trains hit a bridge, they move very fast. This fast speed can make the bridge fall down. When boats hit a bridge, they are very heavy. This heavy weight can make the bridge fall down. This can happen when the boat moves very slowly too. The best way to stop bridge problems is to plan for them. We have new machines now that can find weak parts in bridges. Workers also have safer places to work now. We can make better bridge designs too. All of these things can help us stop these terrible accidents.

At first, Pi is very scared of the animals. He jumps into the ocean. Then he remembers something important. There are hungry sharks in the water around him. He knows he must climb back into the lifeboat. This is his only choice. The animals in the lifeboat start to kill each other. They eat each other too. This happens one by one. In the end, only Pi and the tiger are left. Pi gives the tiger a name. He calls him Richard Parker. Pi is lucky because the tiger feels sick from the boat. The tiger does not want to eat Pi right now.

Pi is 16 years old. A new government wins in his country. His parents do not like this new government. They are worried about what will happen next. Pi's parents decide to close their zoo. They want to move to Canada with their family.

They sell some animals to zoos in North America. The family gets on a big ship to go to Canada. They take their animals with them on the ship. When they are traveling, there is a very bad storm. The ship goes down into the water.

Pi's mother, father and brother all die in the water. All the sailors on the ship die too. This is very sad. But Pi does not die. He gets into a small boat on the water. There are animals in the boat with him. There is a hyena, a zebra, and an orang-utan. There is also a very big tiger in the boat.

The Hunger Games is a very popular book for teenagers and young people. An American writer called Suzanne Collins wrote it. The book came out in 2008. Now people can read it in 26 different languages. The book sold millions of copies around the world. It was the first young people's book to sell more than one million electronic copies. Hollywood made a big film from the book. The film was very successful too. In its first weekend, the film made 152.5 million dollars. This was only in North America!

Maybe we dream because our mind puts our day thoughts together. But in dreams, these thoughts are special. When we are awake, our thoughts are like words. We talk to ourselves in our head. But when we sleep, the brain part for language does not work much. The brain part for feelings works more then.

Good relationships make people happy. One study looked at happy people. Most happy people had strong connections with friends and family. They spent time with these people often.

You need one special person in your life. This person is someone you can talk to about your personal feelings. You can share your private thoughts with them. This is called talking from your heart. One person like this is enough. But you also need other friends and family around you.

It is not enough to have many friends just for fun activities. It is not enough to have friends just to talk about music or football. You need that one deeper connection. This deeper connection is very important.

Some people must learn how to listen well to others. When they listen better, they can make stronger relationships with people.

Carol Dweck is a psychologist. She studies how people learn. She says our brains can change and grow. We can get better at things. We are not good at some things first. But we can learn.

Many people say good things in the wrong way. They say "You are really good at seeing small things." They say "You are great at planning parties." They praise the final result. They think some people are born with special talents.

But research shows a better way. We should praise how people work. We should not just praise what they do. We should say good things about their hard work. We should praise when they try new things. We should praise when they solve problems in smart ways.

When we praise the work, people learn better. They learn new skills. They keep working to get better at their talents. This helps people grow. This helps people get better.

The rover looks at the air around it sometimes. In 2014 it found something important in the air. The air had methane in it. Methane is a very simple gas. It is also a main part of natural gas. Methane has special things about it. It can only stay for a few hundred years. This means something on Mars is making new methane all the time. NASA says Mars sends out thousands of tons of methane at one time. The amount of methane goes up and down in different seasons of the year. It is like the planet is breathing the methane in and out.

Carol Dweck is a psychologist. She works at Stanford University. She did a test with children when she started her job. The children were ten years old. She gave them problems to solve. The problems were too difficult for them.

One group of children was happy about this. They said they loved the challenge. They knew they could get better at things. Carol says these children had a 'growth mindset'. This means they think they can learn new things in the future.

But another group of children felt bad. They thought Carol wanted to see how smart they were. They felt they could not do it. These children had a 'fixed mindset'. They did not think they could get better. Some of these children said they wanted to cheat later. Other children looked for someone who did worse than them. This made them feel better.

Horror films love empty places where no people live. This could be an old hospital that nobody uses now. It could be a scary house where nobody lives. It could be a town where all the people went away. There is something special about lonely, empty places. What was life like when people lived there? Why did the people leave these places? Maybe these places are scary because they are so quiet too. Empty places are also good for horror film directors. It is easy to believe that your phone will not work in these places.

All houses have basements. In scary movies, basements are always frightening places. Bad things hide in basements. Evil people put their dangerous things there too. Basements are always dark. They are often wet and cold. You can only go down to a basement on thin stairs. The stairs are not wide. Basements make you feel scared. This happens even when nothing bad is down there. People always feel afraid when they go to basements in horror films.

Gary Collins was a policeman. He was not working that day. He was watching the London riots on TV. He saw many people on TV. He knew some of these people. He stopped his holiday early. He wanted to help the police find these people.

Gary spent six months looking at CCTV videos. CCTV cameras film everything in the streets. Gary looked at all the films from the riots. He found 190 people in the videos. Sometimes he could only see their eyes. But he still knew who they were.

Gary's help was very important for the police investigation. The police had 200,000 hours of video. They also had computer software to find faces. But the computer could only find one person. Gary found 190 people with his eyes.

I think it is very interesting to think about our future. We will change our bodies to become better people. Think about this - we can put a small computer in our brain! We will be able to do this soon. The computer will help us be better at math. It will help us see and hear better. It will help us remember things better. More and more people will want to do this in the future.

The talk was very interesting. The speaker was right about important things. She talked about parents and their children. We cannot expect teenagers to stop texting when they do homework. This is because they see their parents use social media. Their parents use phones when they cook dinner. Their parents use phones when they wait at traffic lights. She also said something true about people. People want to be in many places at the same time. So they change between real conversations and online conversations. I see this happen with my teenage daughter. I see this happen with her friends all the time. They plan to meet each other. Then they sit together but they do not talk. Each person talks to different people online instead.

News stories make us think the world has more violence now. But there are some good things too. From 1945 to 1990, there were 30 big wars. These wars killed more than 100,000 people each. Today there are still wars inside countries. But most countries live together more peacefully than before. Terrorism has grown a lot in recent years. Since 1945, wars have killed more normal people than soldiers. But the numbers are not all bad for normal people. People die nine times more from crime than from political fighting. The number of murders around the world went down a little. In 2000, there were 8 murders for every 100,000 people. In 2015, there were about 5.3 murders for every 100,000 people.

Wasfia has worked all her life to help human rights. She has seen many international projects in her country. These projects wanted to teach and train women and girls. But these projects often stopped working. When they stopped, the women had nothing left. Wasfia saw that Bangladesh needed to help itself. She decided to bring together two things she loved. These were mountain climbing and human rights. She wanted to change how people think about women in her country. She started climbing mountains when she worked in Tibet and Nepal. She worked there on projects to help people. In Bangladesh, most people never see mountains. This is because Bangladesh is flat and near the sea. Her plan is working well now. People in her country are watching her. People around the world are watching her too.

Most people think that poor countries are in a very bad situation. They think these countries have terrible poverty. They think bad leaders control these countries. They think there is no hope for good changes. But this is not true. This will surprise you.

The truth is very different. A big change is happening now. In the last 20 years, more than 700 million people got more money. They are not poor anymore. Also, six million fewer children die every year because of sickness. Millions more girls can go to school now. Millions of people can drink clean water now.

Many managers want to say bad things in a nice way. They say one good thing first. Then they say the bad thing. Then they say another good thing. This is like a sandwich. The bad news is in the middle.

But workers are not stupid. When managers always do this, workers learn the pattern. Workers think the good words are not true. They think managers only say good things because they want to say bad things too. So workers do not believe the good words.

Managers should not do this. Good words should be real. Good words should make workers happy about their work. Good words should make workers want to work well again. Good words are important. They should not be there just to help bad words.

I am in a group. The group is called Campaign to Stop Killer Robots. Do not think about scary robot movies like Terminator. Think about what happens now. Military machines kill people today. Drones kill people. Gun robots kill people. Humans do not control these machines much. The next step will be worse. Robots will kill people alone. These robots will get orders from humans. But then the robots will choose who to kill. I think this is very wrong. It is dangerous for all people in the world. We must be careful. We must think about what we tell machines to do.

More people learn English than all other languages together. English is spoken in more countries than any other language. But Chinese has the most native speakers by far. There is not much connection between native speakers and learners of a language. But there is a stronger connection between learners and how many countries speak the language. When a language is spoken in many countries, more people want to learn it.

Your manager stops you. She says she needs to talk about your work on the new project. You worry about it all weekend. You think about what you did wrong. On Monday morning you go into her office. She starts. She says good things about your work on the project. You think this might be the usual way managers talk to workers. You know how this works. First they say something nice. Then they say what they really want to say. Then they say something nice again.

This is a fast rock album with songs you can dance to. The name is Born in the USA. But the words in the songs are very sad and serious. The music sounds happy and strong, but the stories are about difficult times. The songs tell us about the dark parts of life in America.

Many songs are about normal working people who have hard lives. These people work a lot but they don't get rich or famous. They feel angry and sad because life is not good for them. 

One song is called Glory Days. It is about people in a small town. They think about when they were young. When they were young, they felt they could do anything. Now they are older and life is harder.

Another song is called Downbound Train. It tells the story of a young man. He loses his job and this makes his whole life very bad.

You can think that the singer knows real people like this. Maybe his life could be like theirs if he didn't become a famous singer. The album shows you that the Boss has very special talent. He is really different from other singers.

Lewis wants to see more protected sea areas in the world. Now only 3 per cent of the sea is protected. He wants this to be 10 per cent. This will help to stop the damage that people make. People catch too many fish. They put dirty things in the water. They throw rubbish in the sea.

Lewis travels to many places and sees this damage with his own eyes. He swims over coral reefs. The coral is white and dead because the water is too hot now. He swims under the water in the Red Sea. There are no fish or plants there. It looks like a desert. There is plastic everywhere.

Lewis thinks that nature can get better if we give it space. But we must act quickly. If we don't take care of our seas now, soon we will have a very big problem. Then it will be too late to fix it.

Terrie Sharp is a famous writer. She sells many books. She won the Olive Crime Writer Award two times. This award is for crime writers.

Terrie was born in Glasgow. She lived in a place with many problems. There was a lot of crime there. It was not safe. She learned to be quiet. She learned to stay away from trouble. She also learned how to open car doors with a knife.

Now Terrie uses what she learned to write her books. She writes crime stories. She is not quiet now. She goes on TV shows. One show is called Police Today. Many people watch this show during the day. She also goes to meetings about writing. These meetings happen in different places in the UK. Writers go there to talk about their work.

Do you think things get worse every day? Do you think we cannot make things better? Steven Pinker wrote a book. The book is called Enlightenment Now. He looks at how people live now and before. He finds good things about our lives today. We live longer than people before us. We are more healthy than people before us. We have more freedom than people before us. We are more happy than people before us.

Pinker says there is a big problem now. Some people attack important ideas. They attack reason and science. Some people on TV do bad things. Some leaders do bad things too. They make people think only about their own group. They make people feel that things cannot change. They make people not trust other people. When this happens, we are in danger. We can break important things. Then we cannot fix them. Democracy is one important thing. Working with other countries is another important thing.

In old scary movies, the main people were in big trouble. It was very hard for them to ask for help. They could not call the police easily. Now we have mobile phones. This makes those old stories less real. How can movie makers keep the scary feeling? They use no phone signal! If you are the hero in a scary movie, something will happen. At the most important time, you will need to call for help. But your phone will have no signal at all. Or your phone battery will stop working when you try to call. Sometimes both things happen together.

In the 1950s, banana companies in Central America had a big problem. Their best banana was dying. This banana was called Gros Michel. People also called it Big Mike. This banana made a lot of money for the companies. Now the same thing is happening again. The new banana that replaced Big Mike is also dying. This new banana is called Cavendish.

The Gros Michel banana was very good for business. It had thick skin so it was easy to transport. It also tasted very sweet. People liked to buy it. This banana plant grew in most banana farms in Central America.

United Fruit was the biggest banana company at that time. They grew bananas in South America. They sold bananas to other countries. They wanted to make bananas in the fastest way possible. They did not grow banana plants from seeds. Instead, they cut small parts from banana plant stems. Then they planted these parts to make new banana plants. All the new plants were exactly the same. They put many banana plants very close together in their fields.

Most spiders have poison in their bodies. They use this poison to stop or kill small animals for food. They do not want to attack people. Only 25 types of spiders can really hurt humans with their poison. Spider bites can hurt a lot but they do not usually kill people. Australia has a very dangerous spider called the Sydney funnel-web spider. But no person died from this spider after 1981 because doctors made special medicine. You must be careful with hairy spiders like tarantulas. When these spiders feel scared, they shoot special hairs at you. These hairs can hurt your skin and eyes very much. The hairs go into your skin and stay there.

This scary movie idea was very popular in scary films from the 1980s and 1990s. The story starts with a group of young people having fun together. The story ends with all of them dead but one girl is still alive. At the start, the girl is usually quiet and shy. She is not very strong or brave. By the end, she becomes the strongest and smartest person. She learns to fight and solve problems very well. The last girl almost always wins at the end.

We want to know something important. Where did our ability to use difficult language come from? We need to look at our brains. Our brains are different from other animals. This is not just about brain size. It is about what other things our brains can do. We also need to know when our brains changed. We need to know why they changed that way.

There are very few things we can find. These things can help us understand this problem. The old things are from our family from long ago. They left these things behind. But these old things do not tell us about speech. They do not show us what sounds these people could make.

But we can see one thing. We can see it in the bones of early humans. We can see how the mouth changed. We can see how the throat changed. We can see how the tongue changed too.

About 100,000 years ago something happened. Humans could make complex sounds then. Before that time it was different. Scientists study how animals change. These scientists can only guess about early humans. They do not know if early humans could talk. They do not know if they used simple sounds. They do not know if they used no sounds at all.

People in our society tell us that girls should like arts and languages. They say boys should do maths and physics. This is not natural. It is what people teach us.

Young people do not see many women doing science jobs. Cartoons and stories usually show men as scientists. The crazy scientist is a man. The smart inventor is a man. The astronaut who goes to space is a man.

Many people think scientists are strange. They think scientists cannot talk to people well. They think science work is lonely. They think scientists do not connect with other people. These ideas are not true. TV and movies show these wrong ideas about scientists.

Because of these wrong ideas, girls do not want to be scientists. They do not think science jobs are good for them. They do not feel that science is right for them.

If girls saw more women doing science jobs, things would change. Girls would feel more confident about science. They would feel that science subjects are for them too.

The Scallion newspaper comes out every week. Students can get it free in university buildings. About 10,000 students read it. Only students write the newspaper and make it. 

A survey asked people about the newspaper. University students and workers like it very much. They read it because it is fun. It also helps them learn about culture. Students who work on the newspaper get good work experience.

It costs a lot of money to print the newspapers. Some students cannot get the newspaper easily. They must go to the university to get a copy. This is a problem for some students.

The newspaper also creates problems for the environment. Many copies become trash on the university campus. This makes the campus dirty.

At Girox Foods, 12 workers out of 100 leave their jobs every year. This number may look normal, but other food companies only lose 7 workers out of 100 each year. Our number is too high. This report will look at why workers are not happy at our company. We will find out what problems they have at work. Then we will give ideas to make work better for our employees. We want more workers to stay with our company for a long time.

The speaker said many things that were true. I really think there is a problem. When we are more connected to technology, we feel more alone. This is not a big problem for my generation. We lived without technology for many years. We know how to be alone. We also know that being alone is OK. But young people under 20 are very different. They are always busy talking to people on their phones. They never feel what it is like to be alone. They do not learn that they can be happy when they are alone. Also, they learn to talk through messages. They can change and edit these messages. But they do not learn how to have real conversations. They do not learn to talk to the person who is with them right now.

Do not always give good words and bad words together. When you always say good things and bad things at the same time, people will not believe the good things. They will not listen to you. Sometimes you must give only good words. Do not always try to help with problems too. Sometimes just say nice things and stop.

Your dreams might reveal many new ideas about things that you didn't realize you were thinking about during the day. Many people have experienced similar dreams such as flying through the air or falling from high places, losing their teeth or finding themselves without clothes when other people can see them. These common dreams probably represent something similar for most people who have them. However, if you want to understand exactly what your personal dreams mean to you, you should try to connect them to the events that happen in your daily life and how you feel about those situations. Since dreams often reflect our worries or hopes, they could help you learn more about yourself if you think about them carefully.

One of the most interesting examples of wild animals that have learned to live in cities are the wild dogs of Moscow. In Moscow, there are about 35,000 wild dogs that live on the streets, although many people don't know about them. Some of these dogs were born wild, while others used to be family pets that their owners have abandoned or left behind. Some dogs prefer to live alone, but others have formed groups because it helps them survive better in the busy city.

In 2010, scientists studied these dogs and discovered something quite amazing about their behavior. The dogs have learned to live very successfully in the city environment, even though it is completely different from their natural habitat. They have figured out that it is much safer to cross busy streets when people are crossing too, since cars will stop for humans. Some dogs have even learned to watch traffic lights and seem to understand when the lights change from red to green, which shows they can recognize patterns.

This example demonstrates how clever animals can be when they need to adapt to survive in a completely new environment, and it proves that wildlife might be more intelligent than we usually think.

Wonder is New Yorker RJ Palacio's first novel, which has become quite successful since it was published. On her website, she explains that the idea for the book came to her after she saw a girl with facial differences on the street one day. The girl's appearance was different from other people's faces, and this experience inspired Palacio to write her story. Wonder has been extremely popular in the United States and has already won several important awards for children's literature. Many schools have started using it to begin discussions about bullying, friendship and what it feels like when you are different from others in your community. Although the book deals with serious topics, it presents them in a way that young readers can understand and connect with. Someone is currently making a film adaptation of the book, and many people, including me, are eagerly waiting to see what RJ Palacio will write next because we really want to read her new stories and characters.

Chloe has two pet rats called Zena and Roxy. She knows that most people don't choose rats as pets, and she has tried to explain many times that rats are actually clean animals. She tells people that rats can be wonderful pets if you take care of them properly. However, Chloe understands why people have bad feelings about rats because she used to feel the same way.

Before she got her rats, Chloe didn't like them either. Everything changed when her friend Martin showed her his pet rats. She could see that the rats were very loving and smart animals. This experience made her think differently about rats as pets. Last year, one of Martin's rats had baby rats, so Chloe decided that she would like to have two of them for herself.

Cape Town can be a dangerous place for baboons. Some baboons have been hurt or killed in car accidents, while others have died because they played with electric cables. Baboons are animals that might disappear forever if we don't protect them. The city council has decided to help these animals and reduce problems between humans and baboons, so they have given jobs to a team called Baboon Monitors. These monitors must chase baboons away from city areas or catch them so they can let them go free in the countryside. This plan has worked quite well, although it is still difficult to stop baboons from returning to the city. The baboons come back because they think the city is a place where they can find food easily.

I work for a big IT company around the world, but their main office is in America, so I do all my work online from my house. This means that I don't need to spend time traveling to work or having small conversations with other workers. I work on different projects, and this freedom is very important to me because it means I can easily take time off when my children need me at their school shows or when I have to go to the dentist. However, the bad side is that I don't have clear working hours, so I often work until late in the evening. Sometimes I even miss dinner because I want to finish my work tasks.

In the 1990s, graffiti has continued but there was also a big increase in street art around the world. Some artists wanted to make political points, so they created art that tried to make people think about war, unfair treatment and discrimination. Other street artists were more interested in making beautiful and attractive work. In South America, many street artists have gone to work in poor areas because they wanted to add colour, life and beauty to grey city walls.

Social media, magazines and shop windows show people many things to buy every day, and British shoppers are buying more clothes and shoes than they have ever bought before. Online shopping means it is easy for customers to buy things without thinking about it first, while big clothing companies offer such cheap clothes that people can throw them away after wearing them only two or three times.

Sam looked at the sun and tried to see the dust cloud that the car had made. The car was driving up to the Big House. The horses were moving around because flies were bothering them, but they didn't care about their owner's first visit in ten months. Sam waited there. Mr Carter only came out to this place when he really had to, which was good for Sam. If he could stay away from his boss, he would keep his job longer. Mr Carter cleaned the sweat from his neck with his hand. The wet areas on his shirt were getting bigger and joining together. His skin was already getting red because of the hot June sun. You could see that he usually stayed inside - he looked like a man who made money while other people did all the hard work.

Many people who live in Berlin, Germany said that shooting pigs was too cruel and not necessary. Hunters and people who love animals had angry arguments about this problem. Because there were so many protests, the city council decided to use more peaceful ways to deal with the pigs. They have built fences instead of shooting the animals, and they have made a new law so that people cannot feed the pigs anymore. We will see if this plan works in the future, although it might be difficult to win this fight. This is because winters are getting warmer now, which means there are more pigs than there were before.

The Hunger Games book has been influenced by Suzanne's passion for ancient Greek mythology, which she discovered during her childhood. When she was young, she became fascinated by the story about Theseus and the Minotaur. In this myth, the city of Athens had been defeated by another powerful place called Crete, although the Athenian people continued to resist this foreign control. Because they rebelled against their rulers, King Minos of Crete decided that he would punish them severely. He forced the people of Athens to send seven boys and seven girls to Crete every year as a tribute. These young people were taken into a complicated maze where a dangerous half-man, half-bull creature called the Minotaur lived and devoured them. However, one brave young man called Theseus volunteered to go, and he managed to kill this terrifying monster. Suzanne believes that Katniss Everdeen represents a modern version of Theseus, even though her story takes place in a future world where technology has advanced.

Zoos have created connections between people and animals, which means they can teach visitors about wildlife protection in meaningful ways. When people see animals at the zoo, they might understand why we should save endangered species and protect the natural places where they live. Some modern zoos have become safe homes for animals that people have treated badly in circuses or other entertainment places. They also help abandoned pets that their owners have left behind because they could not take care of them anymore.

Zoos do important research work as well, although many people don't know about this. Scientists study how animals behave and react in different situations, so they can learn more about animal psychology. They also research animal diseases and discover better ways to help sick animals recover completely. This research has helped many wild animals survive, even though some people believe that zoos are not suitable places for animals to live happily.

A different trend is growing because people want to fight against buying too many things – this is called the 'buy nothing' trend. The idea started in Canada in the early 1990s and then moved to the US. There it became a way to say no to spending too much money on Black Friday and Cyber Monday, which happen during Thanksgiving weekend. On Buy Nothing Day, people organize different kinds of protests and they cut up their credit cards. During the whole year, Buy Nothing groups help people exchange things they already have and repair items that are broken.

Is graffiti art or vandalism? This depends on how you see it, but in many countries, writing or painting on public or private property is considered vandalism. Many street artists have been stopped by the police and some have had to pay money as punishment. Many city councils complain about the high cost of cleaning graffiti off buildings, buses and trains.

What do people in the art world think about graffiti and street art? In recent years, more people have started to see it as real art. There have been big exhibitions of street art in art galleries in Paris, London and Los Angeles. The American artist Elura Emerald organized a street art exhibition at a New York gallery in 2008. She supported street artists and said that artists who paint on the street are just showing their feelings and ideas. She believed they are not hurting anyone, so people should like their work and celebrate what they do.

If most people have four to six dreams every night after they turn ten years old, this means they will have about 2,000 dreams each year. So when they reach 80 years old, the average person might have experienced around 140,000 dreams during their lifetime. Although we forget 95 to 99 percent of our dreams, we could still remember several thousand dreams while we are alive. It should not be surprising that sometimes we have a dream and then something similar actually happens in real life. This is particularly true if the dream includes activities that happen regularly in our everyday life, because these situations are more likely to occur again in the future. However, this connection between dreams and reality might simply be a coincidence, since we dream about things we know well from our daily experiences.

The Hunger Games happens in the future, after North America has been destroyed. The country is called Panem and it has twelve poor districts that are controlled by the rich Capitol. The Capitol has complete power over the whole nation, so all districts must do what they say. Each district is responsible for making different products for the Capitol. District 12, where the story starts, gives all the coal to the country. There used to be a thirteenth district, but they fought against the Capitol in the past. Because of this rebellion, the Capitol destroyed them completely.

Wild animals often come into cities because they need to find food, which has become a serious problem in many places. In Cape Town, South Africa, baboons have been moving into neighborhoods where people live near the city for several years now. They search for food there since their natural habitat doesn't provide enough anymore. The baboons have learned to open rubbish bins and they regularly eat fruit from people's gardens, although this damages the plants. Some baboons have become very confident, so they even break into houses when nobody is watching. They take food from kitchen cupboards and fridges, which causes expensive damage to people's homes! Baboons can be quite dangerous animals and they have attacked many pet cats and dogs in these areas. Because of this ongoing situation, most people who live in the city don't want the baboons there anymore. This reaction is easy to understand since the animals might seriously hurt their beloved pets or even small children.

Many bridge accidents happen while people are building the bridge. These accidents often occur because engineers have made a mistake, such as getting their calculations wrong. The bridge falls down because it cannot support its own weight, and this can kill the workers who are on the bridge when it happens.

George Lucas was one of the first film directors who used the 17 stages of the hero's journey to build his story. Usually the hero begins the story while they are living a normal life, but then something happens that asks them to go on an adventure. This adventure will change everything in their life. At the start of Star Wars, Luke has been living a normal life with his aunt and uncle, and he spends his time fixing robots. However, when he discovers Princess Leia's message to Obi-Wan Kenobi inside the robot R2D2, this becomes 'the call to adventure'. This call is what starts the hero on their long journey.

Another idea that people have talked about is to protect Earth from a dangerous space rock that might hit us. They want to destroy it with a nuclear weapon. This might sound like something from a movie, and it was the main story of the 1998 film Armageddon. However, there is a real plan that NASA has made called HAMMER. This means Hypervelocity Asteroid Mitigation Mission for Emergency Response.

The plan works like this: scientists would shoot heavy rockets at a space rock that is coming towards Earth. These rockets weigh eight tons each. Scientists hope this will push the space rock away from our planet so it cannot hit us. But if the space rock was too close to Earth, this pushing method would not work well enough. In that case, the rockets would carry nuclear bombs instead. Then they could blow up the space rock completely before it reaches Earth.

Campbell says that the hero first says no to the adventure call, but then a teacher appears who helps them. After this, they decide to 'cross the threshold' and go into the 'special world' where the adventure takes place. The next part has tests that the hero must pass, enemies they have to fight and friends they meet while they get ready for their biggest challenge. For Luke, his teacher is Obi-Wan, his friends are Han Solo and the robots R2D2 and C3PO, and his enemy is Darth Vader. All of this happens in the special world of the Death Star.

Items that people don't use much might seem useless to some people, but they could be valuable to others. Since the internet has become popular, online communities have found a way to make money from sharing these unused items. People can now use websites and social media groups that help with buying and selling second-hand goods, so it has become much easier for people to share things with each other. This is called the sharing economy.

Around the 18th and 19th centuries, two main ideas about dreams have become popular. One idea was that the things we see in our dreams show things that are hidden from our normal thinking. Freud believed that if we understand what dreams are telling us, we can understand our hidden feelings and the problems they might cause us. However, the other idea was completely different. It said that dreams are just a mix of random activity in the brain while it organizes memories and events from the day. When we wake up, we try to make sense of these random pictures and feelings, so we put them into some kind of story.

I'm a freelancer and work for myself. This is great because I can control what I do and how I spend my time. At first, I was working from home, but I found it really hard to focus on my work. There were too many things that took my attention away from work: housework that I should do, making another cup of tea, my family members who wanted my help with different things. So I started to go to a café near my home to work, but the internet connection wasn't good and I drank too much coffee. In the end, I decided to rent a desk in a shared office space with five other freelancers like myself. I liked getting dressed to go to work in the morning, and I could focus much better in an office environment.

Whether NASA can find the other medium-sized NEOs depends on getting money to build NEOCam. This is a 0.5-metre space telescope that would use infrared light to find asteroids. If NASA gets the money, it could probably reach its goal in ten years. However, once they have recorded all the asteroids, the planetary defence team would still need to work out how to protect the planet. They must find ways to stop the really dangerous asteroids from hitting Earth - these are called PHAs.

The 'buy nothing' trend has now reached influencers on social media. These people usually share posts about clothing and make-up that they want people to buy. However, some YouTube stars now tell their viewers not to buy anything at all. They suggest doing this for periods as long as a year.

Two friends in Canada have spent a year trying to buy only food. For the first three months, they learned how to live without buying electrical things, clothes or items for their house. This was difficult because they had to change their daily habits completely.

For the next stage, they stopped paying for services. For example, they didn't get haircuts, eat out at restaurants or buy petrol for their cars. Although this was hard work, the results were amazing. In one year, they had saved $55,000 because they didn't spend money on things they didn't really need.

Religion has always been very important to Pi, and it shapes how he thinks about life. His family follows the Hindu religion, which they have practiced for many years, but Pi wants to learn about other religions too because he is curious about different ways to believe in God. He becomes good friends with a Christian priest who teaches him about Jesus, and he also gets to know a Muslim baker who shows him Islamic prayers and traditions.

Everyone in his community is quite surprised when Pi tells them that he considers himself Hindu, Muslim and Christian at the same time.
